Elliotte Rusty Harold wrote:
> I just wish we could have gotten that understanding clear in APP. I'm
> afraid APP went the other way and allowed some servers to use PUT as
> PATCH and others to use it as REPLACE, without necessarily telling the
> client whihc one they were doing. :-(

Disagreed. APP is silent on that matter (which is good), so what counts 
is the definition of PUT (RFC2616).

As a matter of fact, this very discussion (over on the APP mailing list) 
was one of the reasons why James Snell started to work on the orphaned 
PATCH Internet Draft.

BR, Julian
